title: Bad Romance
lyrics: Rah-rah- ah-ah-ah! Muh-muh- muh-muh-mah! Rah-rah- ooh-la-la! Want your bad romance I want your ugly I want your I want your everything As long as it’s free I want your love Love-love-love I want your love I want your leather studded kiss in the sand I want your loving And I want your revenge You and me could write a bad romance I want your loving All your love is revenge You and me could write a bad romance Oh- oh-oh-oh-oooh! Oh- oh-oooh-oh-oh! Caught in a bad romance
